name: DENT_TREATMENT
description: This contains dental treatment plan information which is not expected to change over time.

columns.name: TREATMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the treatment plan record

columns.name: COMPLETED_DTTM_DTTM
columns.description: Date and time the dental treatment was completed

columns.name: TR_STATUS_NOADD_C_NAME
columns.description: This keeps track of the latest status of a treatment.

columns.name: DENTAL_DEPT_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: The external name of the department record. This is often used in patient correspondence such as reminder letters.

columns.name: TR_SUG_START_DATE
columns.description: The suggested start date for a treatment.

columns.name: TR_SEQUENCE_NUM
columns.description: Keep track of relative orders for a treatment within a treatment plan

columns.name: DENTAL_TREAT_SER_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: DENT_PARENT_TRMT_ID
columns.description: This points to the parent treatment of which this treatment is part.

columns.name: DENT_OPTION_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The status of an option for treatment within a dental treatment.

columns.name: DENTAL_ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The linked patient estimate record detailing cost information for the procedures in this treatment.

columns.name: TR_APRV_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the dental treatment was last approved.

columns.name: TR_APRV_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who last approved the treatment.

columns.name: TR_APRV_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: TR_APRV_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The approval status category ID for the treatment.

columns.name: TR_RESCIND_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: The rescind reason category ID for the treatment.
